overview: Lao Beng has a red umbrella, and he was never seen without it. One day, after his daily afternoon visits to a restaurant, he comforted a crying child on his way back home. It was only when he reached home he realised his empty hands. Taking a risk, he makes his way back to the restaurant in search of the umbrella but struggles to make it back home due to his Alzheimer's condition.
title: The Umbrella
